title: (x) Colombian Newspaper font, 1940s - Memphis {Mike Y}
content:
![Colombian Newspaper font 1940s](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142549im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25463.jpg)   
   
Anyone know about the type being used in Latin American vs. the US? Did they mainly use imported fonts, or were there original typefaces being produced?
author: apocalypso

comments.content: Looks a lot like Stymie but the R is different...

Ah, of course! Missed that!   
Nice one, Mike ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142549im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
